import {React,useState,useEffect,useRef} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import vk from "../img/light/vk.png" import tg from "../img/light/telegram.png" import { ThemeProvider } from "styled-components"; import { darkTheme, lightTheme, GlobalStyles } from "../components/Themes"; const Oplata = () => { let [,stet] = useState("") let theme = localStorage.getItem("theme") const switchTheme = () => { if(theme == "light"){ localStorage.setItem("theme","dark") stet(Math.random()) } else { localStorage.setItem("theme","light") stet(Math.random()) } }; return (
